page.title: 15CHALFONT AREA TRANSPORT
page.content: SEER GREEN AND JORDANS {STATION} is on the site of a halt built for a Director of the Great Central Line. It maintains a passenger and freight service between London, Banbury and Aylesbury. 53 {trains} stopping daily from 06.11 to 23.17 with 19 regular weekday passengers. It is manned by a Station Manager only between 06.00 and 14.00. A SURVEY OF THE {A40}.Some First School children went down to the A40 at 14.00. There we counted what was using the road.There were 42 vans but no caravans. There were 2 motorbikes, 0 coaches and 0 buses but there were 272 cars and 54 lorries.We saw 0 pedestrians and 0 horses.Next we went on a Monday morning at 08.45.This time we saw more cars, bikes, coaches, caravans and pedestrians but fewer lorries and vans.
